data.name: Resident Evil 4
data.description:
Rated 9/10 by IGN and winner of Best VR/AR Game at The Game Awards 2021, Resident Evil 4 continues to earn rave reviews: 2022 DICE Awards finalist for VR Game of the Year and winner for VR Game of the Year at the 2022 SXSW Gaming Awards.

Explore the world of Resident Evil 4, entirely remastered for VR. Step into the shoes of special agent Leon S. Kennedy on his mission to rescue the U.S. President’s daughter who was kidnapped by a mysterious cult. Come face to face with enemies, and uncover secrets with gameplay that revolutionized the survival horror genre. Battle horrific creatures and face-off against mind-controlled villagers while discovering their connection to the cult behind the abduction.

Key Features
- New and unique VR interactions that put you in Leon’s shoes, entirely in first-person
- Stunning, high-resolution graphics rebuilt for VR
- Free Update: Face an onslaught of Ganados in the wave-based extra game mode ‘The Mercenaries’ with 20 Challenges, Unlockables, and more

Resident Evil 4 is not permitted for users under 13 years of age

translations.long_description:
Explorez le monde emblématique de Resident Evil 4 dans cette nouvelle version refaite pour la RV. Glissez-vous dans la peau de l'agent spécial Leon S. Kennedy en mission de sauvetage de la fille du président des États-Unis, enlevée par une mystérieuse secte. Progressez dans un village reculé d'Europe, confrontez-vous a des ennemis fanatisés et expérimentez le gameplay qui a révolutionné le genre du survival horror. Combattez d'ignobles créatures contaminées par le parasite Las Plagas, affrontez des ennemis agressifs, dont des villageois possédés, et découvrez leur lien avec Los Illuminados, le culte responsable de l'enlèvement.

Points forts
- Des interactions en RV inédites, qui vous font adopter le point de vue de Leon S. Kenney.
- Des environnements de RV immersifs, qui vous entraînent dans les méandres du monde de Resident Evil 4.
- Des graphismes époustouflants en haute résolution repensés pour la RV.
translations.short_description: Rejouez le classique survival horror, Resident Evil 4, intégralement repensé pour la RV. Incarnez l'agent spécial Leon S. Kennedy, en vue à la première personne, envoyé dans un village européen pour sauver la fille du président des États-Unis.

translations.long_description:
Erkunden Sie die Welt von „Resident Evil 4“ in dieser für VR neu entwickelten Version auf ganz neue Weise. Als Spezialagent Leon S. Kennedy sollen Sie die Tochter des US-Präsidenten retten, die von einer geheimnisvollen Sekte entführt worden ist. Bahnen Sie sich einen Weg durch das entlegene Dorf, stellen Sie sich fordernden Gegnern, lüften Sie Geheimnisse und erleben Sie das genreprägende Gameplay hautnah. Sie werden gegen albtraumhafte, mit dem Las-Plagas-Parasiten infizierte Kreaturen kämpfen und gegen aggressive Gegner, etwa die gehirngewaschenen Dorfbewohner, bestehen müssen, um deren Verbindung zu Los Illuminados aufzudecken – der Sekte, die hinter der Entführung steckt.

Features
- Neue VR-Interaktionen, die Sie vollkommen in der Rolle von Leon S. Kennedy aufgehen lassen, jetzt in echter Egoperspektive.
- Immersive VR-Umgebungen, dank derer Sie ganz in die mysteriöse Welt von „Resident Evil 4“ abtauchen.
Atemberaubende, hochauflösende Grafik, speziell für VR.
translations.short_description: DER Survival-Horror-Klassiker „Resident Evil 4“ kehrt im VR-Gewand zurück. Gehen Sie voll auf in Ihrer Rolle als Spezialagent Leon S. Kennedy, der in ein mysteriöses Dorf in Südeuropa geschickt wird, um die Tochter des US-Präsidenten zu retten.

translations.long_description:
Explora el icónico mundo de “Resident Evil 4” en esta nueva versión creada totalmente para RV. Conviértete en el agente especial Leon S. Kennedy y cumple su misión para rescatar a la hija del Presidente de Estados Unidos, quien está secuestrada por una secta enigmática. Ábrete paso por un pueblo rural en Europa, encuéntrate cara a cara con enemigos desafiantes y descubre los secretos y el modo de juego que revolucionó por completo el género de survival horror. Lucha contra terribles criaturas infectadas por el parásito las Plagas, enfréntate a enemigos agresivos, como los habitantes del pueblo que están bajo control mental, y descubre su conexión con los Iluminados, la secta detrás del secuestro.

Características principales
- Nuevas interacciones únicas en RV que te ponen en la piel de Leon S. Kennedy, ahora en primera persona.
- Entornos inmersivos de RV que te transportan al misterioso mundo de “Resident Evil 4”.
Espectaculares gráficos en alta resolución renovados para RV.
translations.short_description: Vuelve al título clásico de survival horror, “Resident Evil 4”, renovado por completo para RV. Juega como el agente especial Leon S. Kennedy, con una verdadera perspectiva en primera persona, y recorre un extraño pueblo europeo con la misión de rescatar a la hija del Presidente de Estados Unidos.

translations.long_description:
VR用に完全リメイクされた『バイオハザード4』の象徴的世界を旅しよう。特別捜査官のレオン・S・ケネディになり、謎のカルト教団にさらわれたアメリカ大統領の娘を救出するのがあなたの使命です。ヨーロッパの人里離れた村に足を踏み入れ、迫りくる敵と対決しながら、秘密を解き明かしてください。サバイバルホラーに革命を起こしたあのゲームプレイを堪能しよう。あなたを待ち受けるのは、寄生体プラーガによって変貌した恐ろしいクリーチャーや、洗脳され攻撃的になった村人達。彼らと誘拐事件の黒幕である教団イルミナドスとの関係は？

本作の特長
- 新登場かつ独自のVRインタラクトで、完全一人称視点でレオン・S・ケネディをプレイ
- 没入感あふれるVR環境にどっぷり浸かって、謎めいた『バイオハザード4』の世界を旅しよう
VR用にリメイクされた驚異的な高解像度グラフィックス
translations.short_description: サバイバルホラーの古典的名作『バイオハザード4』がVR用に完全リニューアル。特別捜査官のレオン・S・ケネディが本格的な一人称視点でプレイ可能になりました。謎めいたヨーロッパの村へと派遣されたレオン。彼はアメリカ大統領の娘を救出することができるのか？

changelog.change_log: Bug Fixes - Fixed an issue where users might experience poor performance after certain types of OS updates.

Resident Evil 4 VR - Version 2.1
BUG FIXES
– Audio –
Fixed an issue when entering and returning from the Oculus Shell quickly could result in the game’s audio volume being set lower than intended.
– Krauser –
Fixed specific cases where Krauser’s Special Move haptic vibrations could remain on for longer than intended.
– Leaderboards –
Fixed issues with players being unable to retrieve scores from Leaderboards.

Resident Evil 4 - Version 2.0 - The Mercenaries Update 

The Mercenaries are back in Resident Evil 4! Our latest update implements Resident Evil 4’s classic “The Mercenaries” game mode, with all new additions for VR – including 20 unique Challenges, online Leaderboards, new Unlockable content, and more!

THE MERCENARIES

– Classic Mode –
Fight against hordes of Ganados in timed encounters as you rack up high scores with precision gunfire and strategic use of combos! Earn 4 Stars on a Stage to unlock a new Character. Earn 5 Stars on every Stage to unlock a brand new weapon for the Story Campaign!

- 4 Stages (Village, Castle, Island, and Dockside) with distinctive visual styles and layouts to master.
- 5 Characters (Leon, Ada, HUNK, Krauser, and Wesker) with special weapon sets and combat moves.

– Challenge Mode –
Take on 20 unique Challenges: twists on the Classic Mercenaries Mode, with alternate weapons, enemies, stage visuals, and game rules. Each Challenge offers its own set of strategies to decipher and skills to master.

– Online Leaderboards –
Every Classic Stage and Challenge has its own Online Leaderboard – try to beat the best of the best in world rankings, or just see which of your friends is really the master of The Mercenaries!

– Unlockables –
Earn Medals by achieving high scores in Challenges, allowing you to unlock all new content for the Story Campaign:
- Costumes: Dress up your favorite heroes in Leon’s Mafia Outfit and Ashley’s Knight Armor.
- Weapons: Unleash the power of the heavy-duty Handcannon and the rapid-fire Chicago Typewriter.
- Enhancements: Activate Big Head Mode, Classic Horror Mode, or Fast Forward Mode in the Story Campaign and enjoy the game in a whole new way  – or combine them all for the wildest run through Resident Evil 4 ever experienced!
- Golden Guns: Show off your mastery of The Mercenaries with unique golden skins for every weapon in the game.

BUG FIXES
In addition to the new “The Mercenaries” game mode, we’ve made a host of fixes and adjustments to the main Story Campaign, including but not limited to:

– Ashley –
- Improvements to Ashley’s pathfinding around doors and windows as well as certain room-specific situations.

– Audio –
- Fixed various minor audio issues and audio positioning, as well as improved audio landscape in certain rooms.

– Cinematics –
- Fixed minor visual issues with some cinematics.
- Added subtitles for live voice lines in certain rooms.
- Cinematic shortcut buttons now display proper prompts when the primary controller is set to Left Hand.

– Enemies –
- Fixed various issues with enemy pathfinding and attack behavior in specific room locations.
- Fixed an issue where the player could physically put their gun through a shield or enemy body in order to shoot the enemy or a parasite.

– Interactions
- Improved the behavior of a variety of player interactions with environment props. (example: adjustable paintings)

– Particles –
- Fixed some issues with particle playback, including Ganado’s glowing eyes missing in some night locations.
- Improved particle visuals and performance in various locations.

– Player –
- Player can now physically duck to avoid trip-wires and lasers in the game.
- Fixed player knockback from explosions or mace hits so that it always knocks the player away from the impact, instead of the direction being determined by the player’s current facing direction.
- Fixed various ways the player could accidentally get out of the world when climbing ladders or walls.
- Fixed an animation pop on the player as well as an issue where the camera could clip and spin badly when an enemy slammed the player into the ground.

– Performance –
- Fixed some rare crash cases.
- Improved overall performance of the game when enemies are onscreen, as well as when certain particle systems are active.

– Rooms –
- Improved collision in several rooms to more closely match the visuals.
- Fixed various minor holes in visual geometry, as well as small texture tweaks and z-fighting in certain areas.

– UI –
- Improved the feel of picking up and dropping items in the Inventory, as well as positioning large items.
- Updated the Map to correctly display some differences in map elements based on the floor or location the player is on.
- Fixed an issue where consuming an item immediately after grabbing it might leave the item visual in the Inventory grid until another item was used.
- Fixed an issue where under specific circumstances mixed herbs might disappear when created in the same inventory slot as a previously equipped and used healing item.
- Added “Listen” UI prompt for Shooting Range trophy figurines.

– Weapons –
- Improved knife hit detection, especially versus Ganado types, Parasites, and Door Locks
- Adjusted Iron Sights in the game to make them more accurate.
- Reduced the degree of damage falloff on grenades at certain ranges
- Grenades now do Line of Sight checks for damage in addition to the original game’s basic radius checks.
- Adjusted the Grenade fuse countdown during the “throw arc” visual, allowing the player time to aim the Grenade before it explodes when using this system.
- Fixed an issue where grabbing a grenade with your free hand could cause the grenade in your opposite hand to disappear when in Quick Select Mode, or drop to the ground if it was a live grenade and the player was in Immersive mode.
- Improved grabbing of the rifle forestock and positioning of interactive elements to make it feel more natural/intuitive and easier to grab.
- Adjusted Red9, TMP, and Matilda “shouldering” regions, allowing players to hold the guns closer to the center line and still benefit from stocks.
- Improved the presentation of external UI elements in the Scope view (Blue Medallion Updates, Ashley Dialogue, etc.)

Resident Evil 4 Options Update (version 1.1)

Thank you so much for playing Resident Evil 4 on Quest 2!

We’ve been thrilled to see all the streams, memes, and reviews for RE4 over the past few months. We’re excited to say that we’ve heard your feedback about additional mobility and comfort settings and are happy to introduce new updates to in-game options in Patch v1.1.

FEATURES AND UPDATES:

Options

- Added controller-directional movement (“hand steering”) to the “Steering” options.
- Added the ability to specify which analog stick will be used for movement, separately from the “Dominant Hand” setting.
- Added the ability to adjust your height when in “Standing” mode.
- Added waist and chest holster position adjustment options (height, distance from body, and separation).
- Added an option to disable auto-ejecting of magazines when grabbing ammo from the belt pouch.
- Added an option to disable auto-pulling the pin on thrown grenades.
- Added the ability to set the color of the “Laser Sight” line.

Save Game

- Added a warning when attempting to save the game when the device has very low storage space remaining.

BUG FIXES:

- Fixed an issue that can result in the loss of a save game file if the device has very low storage space remaining.
- Fixed a rare issue that could cause the player to have infinite ammunition and consumables. Users that have already encountered this issue will have their save game repaired on startup.
- Fixed a rare crash related to entering the Shooting Range.
- Fixed a rare crash involving the player being knocked back by an external force.
Welcome to Resident Evil 4 for the Oculus Quest 2
